reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty, with one noting it looks expensive and elegant. The fabric receives mixed feedback - while some say it's well-made, others describe it as cheap and thin. The dress runs large and has fraying in the stitching, and the bow is not included in some orders. Customers disagree on the fit, with some finding it great while others say it's awkwardly loose, and while many find it flattering, one customer notes it's not suitable for curvier shapes. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the Dress!
items.body: The dress is so cute, and white. The fabric has floral features that I didnâ€™t expect. The corset makes me look real cinched and emphasizes my hourglass shape. I am 142lbs, 5â€™1ft and I ordered a small. I would recommend sizing down one from your regular size bc the corset dress can adjust to your size. I am usually a medium, sometimes small. The material is a bit thin, but this is an amazing dress in general, esp with the affordable price point. The dress came within a day or two of ordering. You can attach the bow just fine. No pockets and a bit short Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Just AKWARD.. the bow doesnâ€™t come attached to dress
items.body: We wanted to love this dress. It was so cute. My daughter is very petite. The back part where you zip at top.. was awkwardly loose like it was bigger there. I have no idea why. Also the bow does not come attachedâ€¦ you have the corset laces to try to tie it up. But we couldnâ€™t figure out how to tie it on it not look weird. Because like I said the top part where the zipper ends was bigger.. so when we tried to tie bow on .. made it just look rough. Unfortunately we have to return, she just canâ€™t wear it and it not look akward. Read more
items.author: 6MBones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars RUNNN AND GET IT NOWWW
items.body: BUY IT RUNNNNNN I bought this on a whim because I unexpectedly got invited to go to a homecoming dance and didnâ€™t have a lot of time to find a dress so I saw this thought it was cute and thought I would give it a shot. It wasnâ€™t very expensive so I didnâ€™t have very high hopes but itâ€™s perfect. It is package kind of funny but once you get the wrinkles out, it looks so expensive so elegant it is gorgeous. The bow is such a fun touch and I have bigger hips and it doesnâ€™t make them stick out at all. It makes you look very tight and beautiful if youâ€™re considering getting it just do it. It is perfect. About 145 lbs I normally wear a medium, but it was pretty big so Iâ€™m getting a small. And that works great! And the corset on the back makes you be able to snatch yourself in as much as you want! Read more
items.author: Shopper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: The dress is very cute, I love the bow in the back. My only comment is that the material isnâ€™t the best. Fit: I am 58, 140 pounds and I think that itâ€™s good length and nice tight fit. Flattering: Itâ€™s very flattering and I think very cute. Read more

items.author: LRodz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Homecoming Dress
items.body: I bought it in a medium for my daughter and it was a little too big in the check area. We sized up purposely so I could take it to the seamstress to get it tailored and pressed for her. The bow was not attached but I just ironed it and took the strings out of the corset and placed them through the bow. I was very pleased with how everything turned out as we were truly last minute and did everything the week of homecoming. I would definitely recommend our purchasing this dress if your considering it. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black With 2 Side Bow, Blue, Blue With 2 Side Bow, Black, White With 2 Side Bow, Navy Blue, Nude, Red, Pink, White, Yellow, Dark Blue, Light Pink With 2 Side Bow, Pink With 2 Side Bow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
